name: Smiling Majority
description:
Master's degree dissertation from the video game master degree of the University of Malaga. Developed by:

  • María Donaire Varo. Designer and artist.
  • Álvaro Gutiérrez Rodríguez. Designer, programmer and artist.
  • Elisa Dávila Arreza. Artist and designer.
  • Francisco Miguel López Liñán. Designer and programmer.

And with the collaboration of:

  • Raúl Muñoz Ruíz. Sound designer, composer and teaser developer.
